Touring the university, I envisioned thriving as an engineering student, and now it feels like home through the relationships I’ve built in courses and leadership roles." – Lucy Schneider, Industrial & Systems Engineering double-arrow Supporting the College of Engineering Your support makes it possible for us to be an innovative leader in engineering and architecture education, to create new discoveries across a broad range of applications and disciplines, and to make a difference at home and abroad.
